Such tariffs would reduce New Zealand exports to the US by two-thirds, modelling shows.

Gisborne real estate expert Philip Searle honoured with Reinz Life Membership https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-real-estate-expert-philip-searle-honoured-with-reinz-life-membership/XFFEIQBCHRGYFLDEPCHKC6PFDY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-real-estate-expert-philip-searle-honoured-with-reinz-life-membership/XFFEIQBCHRGYFLDEPCHKC6PFDY/ Wynsley Wrigley'It has good times and bad times. Searle has been a high-profile member of the Gisborne real estate profession for 40 years.
